audioText: Mon collègue reprend le travail après ses vacances lundi prochain.
question: When will the colleague return to work?
options: At the end of this week
explanation: The text states 'Mon collègue reprend le travail après ses vacances lundi prochain' - My colleague resumes work after vacation next Monday. 'Reprend' is the third person singular present of 'reprendre' (to resume/take back).
